Attend the First Olympic Games: I would travel back to Olympia, Greece, in 776 BCE to attend the first Olympic Games and witness the ancient sporting events, including footracing, long jump, and the javelin throw.

Experience the Renaissance: I would travel back to Florence, Italy, during the Renaissance period to witness the birth of modern art, science, and philosophy. I would visit Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo, attend lectures by Galileo, and see the development of the printing press.

Meet the Founding Fathers: I would travel back to Philadelphia in 1787 to attend the Constitutional Convention and witness the creation of the United States Constitution. I would meet George Washington, Benjamin Franklin, and Thomas Jefferson and learn more about the principles of democracy that they established.

Visit the Dinosaur Age: I would travel back 65 million years to the age of dinosaurs and see these magnificent creatures up close. I would also witness the extinction event that wiped out the dinosaurs and learn more about the causes of one of the most catastrophic events in Earth's history.
Attend Woodstock: I would travel back to Bethel, New York, in 1969 to attend the legendary Woodstock music festival and experience the peace, love, and music of the 1960s counterculture movement.
